<o-context-menu #defaultContextMenu>

  <ng-container *ngIf="isDataCell | async">
    <o-context-menu-item attr="refresh" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.REFRESH" svg-icon="ontimize:autorenew" (execute)="refresh()"
      [visible]="isVisibleRefresh | async"></o-context-menu-item>
    <o-context-menu-item attr="detail" icon="chevron_right" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.VIEW_DETAIL" (execute)="gotoDetails($event)"
      [visible]="isVisibleDetail | async"></o-context-menu-item>
    <o-context-menu-item attr="edit" icon="edit" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.EDIT" (execute)="edit($event)" [visible]="isVisibleEdit | async">
    </o-context-menu-item>
    <o-context-menu-item attr="insert" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.INSERT" icon="add" (execute)="add()" [visible]="isVisibleInsert | async">
    </o-context-menu-item>
    <o-context-menu-item attr="delete" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.DELETE" icon="delete" (execute)="delete($event)" [visible]="isVisibleDelete | async">
    </o-context-menu-item>
    <!-- FILTER GROUP -->
    <o-context-menu-group label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.FILTER" icon="filter_alt" type="group" [visible]="isVisibleFilter | async">
      <o-context-menu-item icon="filter_alt" [label]="labelFilterByColumn" (execute)="filterByColumn($event)"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item icon="filter_alt" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.FILTER_BY_VALUE" (execute)="filterByValue()"></o-context-menu-item>
    </o-context-menu-group>
    <!-- COPY GROUP -->
    <o-context-menu-separator [visible]="isVisibleCopy | async"></o-context-menu-separator>
    <o-context-menu-group label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COPY" icon="file_copy" type="group" [visible]="isVisibleCopy | async">
      <o-context-menu-item icon="file_copy" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COPY_CELL" (execute)="copyCell($event)"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item icon="file_copy" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COPY_ROW" (execute)="copyRow($event)"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COPY_ALL" icon="file_copy" (execute)="copyAll()"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COPY_SELECTION" icon="file_copy" (execute)="copySelection()"></o-context-menu-item>
    </o-context-menu-group>
    <o-context-menu-separator [visible]="isVisibleSelectAll | async"></o-context-menu-separator>
    <o-context-menu-item attr="select-all" [label]="table.isAllSelected() ? 'TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.DESELECT_ALL': 'TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.SELECT_ALL'"
      icon="select_all" (execute)="table.isAllSelected() ? unSelectAll() : selectAll()" [visible]="isVisibleSelectAll | async"></o-context-menu-item>

    <!-- GROUP BY -->
    <o-context-menu-separator [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async"></o-context-menu-separator>
    <o-context-menu-group label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY" icon="format_indent_increase" type="group" [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async">
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="isDateColumn | async" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY_YEAR" (execute)="groupByColumn('YEAR')"
        icon="format_indent_increase" type="group" [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async" [enabled]="isEnabledGroupByColumn | async">
      </o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="isDateColumn | async" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY_MONTH" (execute)="groupByColumn('MONTH')"
        icon="format_indent_increase" type="group" [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async" [enabled]="isEnabledGroupByColumn | async">
      </o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="isDateColumn | async" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY_YEAR_MONTH" icon="format_indent_increase" type="group"
        (execute)="groupByColumn('YEAR_MONTH')" [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async" [enabled]="isEnabledGroupByColumn | async">
      </o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="isDateColumn | async" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY_YEAR_MONTH_DAY" icon="format_indent_increase" type="group"
        (execute)="groupByColumn('YEAR_MONTH_DAY')" [visible]="isVisibleGroupByRow | async" [enabled]="isEnabledGroupByColumn | async">
      </o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="!(isDateColumn | async)" icon="format_indent_increase" [label]="labelGroupByColumn" (execute)="groupByColumn()"
        [enabled]="isEnabledGroupByColumn | async"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item *ngIf="isEnabledUnGroupByColumn | async" icon="format_indent_decrease" [label]="labelUnGroupByColumn"
        (execute)="unGroupByColumn()" [enabled]="isEnabledUnGroupByColumn | async"></o-context-menu-item>
      <o-context-menu-item icon="format_line_spacing" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.UNGROUP_ALLCOLUMNS" (execute)="unGroupAll()"
        [enabled]="isEnabledUnGroupAllColumn | async">
      </o-context-menu-item>
    </o-context-menu-group>
  </ng-container>

  <!-- GROUP BY HEADER CELL AGGREGATE FUNCTION -->
  <ng-container *ngIf="isGroupableCell | async">
    <o-context-menu-group label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.GROUP_BY.AGGREGATE_FUNCTION" icon="format_indent_increase" type="group">
      <o-context-menu-item *ngFor="let aggregateFn of availableColumnAggregates" label="{{ 'AGGREGATE_NAME.' + aggregateFn }}"
        (execute)="changeAggregateFunction($event, aggregateFn)"></o-context-menu-item>
    </o-context-menu-group>
  </ng-container>

  <ng-container *ngIf="isTableGroupedRow | async">
    <o-context-menu-item icon="unfold_more" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.EXPAND_ALL_GROUPS" (execute)="expandRowGroupsSameLevel()"></o-context-menu-item>
    <o-context-menu-item icon="unfold_less" label="TABLE_CONTEXT_MENU.COLLAPSE_ALL_GROUPS" (execute)="collapseRowGroupsSameLevel()">
    </o-context-menu-item>
  </ng-container>

</o-context-menu>

<mat-menu #menu="matMenu" x-position="before" [class]="(rowHeightObservable | async) +' o-table-menu'">
  <!-- DEFAULT OPTIONS -->
  <o-table-option #selectAllCheckboxOption *ngIf="showSelectAllCheckbox" [active]="isSelectAllOptionActive" (onClick)="onShowsSelects()"
    label="TABLE.BUTTONS.SELECT" show-checkbox-option="true"></o-table-option>
  <o-table-option #columnsVisibilityButtonOption *ngIf="showColumnsVisibilityButton" (onClick)="onChangeColumnsVisibilityClicked()"
    label="TABLE.BUTTONS.COLVIS"></o-table-option>
  <o-table-option *ngIf="showResetWidthOption" (onClick)="onResetWidthClicked()" label="TABLE.BUTTONS.RESETWIDTH"></o-table-option>

  <mat-divider *ngIf="showSelectAllCheckbox || showColumnsVisibilityButton || showResetWidthOption"></mat-divider>

  <o-table-option #exportButtonOption *ngIf="showExportButton" (onClick)="onExportButtonClicked()" label="TABLE.BUTTONS.EXPORT"></o-table-option>
  <o-table-option (onClick)="onReportOnDemandClicked()" label="TABLE.BUTTONS.REPORT_ON_DEMAND" *ngIf="showReportOnDemandButton"></o-table-option>
  <o-table-option *ngIf="showChartsOnDemandButton" (onClick)="onChartsOnDemandClicked()" label="TABLE.BUTTONS.CHART_ON_DEMAND"></o-table-option>
  <mat-divider *ngIf=" showExportButton || showReportOnDemandButton || showChartsOnDemandButton"></mat-divider>

  <o-table-option #columnsGroupByOption *ngIf="showGroupByButton" (onClick)="onGroupByClicked()" label="TABLE.BUTTONS.GROUPBY"></o-table-option>

  <button type="button" #filterMenuButton *ngIf="showFilterMenu" mat-menu-item [matMenuTriggerFor]="filterMenu">{{
    'TABLE.BUTTONS.FILTER' | oTranslate }}</button>
  <button type="button" #configurationMenuButton *ngIf="showConfigurationMenu" mat-menu-item [matMenuTriggerFor]="configurationMenu">{{
    'TABLE.BUTTONS.CONFIGURATION' | oTranslate }}</button>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</mat-menu>

<mat-menu #filterMenu="matMenu" [class]="(rowHeightObservable| async) +' o-table-menu'">
  <o-table-option #columnFilterOption show-checkbox-option="true" [active]="isColumnFilterOptionActive" (onClick)="onFilterByColumnClicked()"
    label="TABLE.BUTTONS.FILTER_BY_COLUMN">
  </o-table-option>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onStoreFilterClicked()">{{ 'TABLE.BUTTONS.FILTER_SAVE' | oTranslate
    }}</button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onLoadFilterClicked()">{{ 'TABLE.BUTTONS.FILTER_LOAD' | oTranslate
    }}</button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onClearFilterClicked()">{{ 'TABLE.BUTTONS.FILTER_CLEAR' | oTranslate
    }}</button>
</mat-menu>

<mat-menu #configurationMenu="matMenu" [class]="(rowHeightObservable | async) +' o-table-menu'">
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onStoreConfigurationClicked()">{{ 'TABLE.BUTTONS.SAVE_CONFIGURATION' |
    oTranslate }}</button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onApplyConfigurationClicked()">{{ 'TABLE.BUTTONS.APPLY_CONFIGURATION' |
    oTranslate }}</button>
</mat-menu>

<ng-container [ngSwitch]="mode">
  <ng-container *ngSwitchCase="OFormLayoutManagerComponent.TAB_MODE">
    <o-form-layout-tabgroup #tabGroup [title]="title" (onMainTabSelected)="onMainTabSelected.emit($event)"
      (onSelectedTabChange)="onSelectedTabChange.emit($event)" (onCloseTab)="onCloseTab.emit($event)"
      [options]="tabGroupOptions">
      <ng-content *ngTemplateOutlet="contentBlock"></ng-content>
    </o-form-layout-tabgroup>
  </ng-container>

  <ng-container *ngSwitchCase="OFormLayoutManagerComponent.SPLIT_PANE_MODE">
    <o-form-layout-split-pane #splitPane [options]="splitPaneOptions">
      <ng-content *ngTemplateOutlet="contentBlock"></ng-content>
    </o-form-layout-split-pane>
  </ng-container>

  <ng-container *ngSwitchCase="OFormLayoutManagerComponent.DIALOG_MODE">
    <ng-content *ngTemplateOutlet="contentBlock"></ng-content>
  </ng-container>
</ng-container>


<ng-template #contentBlock>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</ng-template>

<button mat-icon-button [attr.aria-label]="'FILTERBUILDERMENU.BUTTONS.ARIALBUTTON' | oTranslate" [matMenuTriggerFor]="filterMenu">
  <ng-container *ngIf="svgIcon !== undefined; else buttonIconTemplate">
    <mat-icon [svgIcon]="svgIcon"></mat-icon>
  </ng-container>
  <ng-template #buttonIconTemplate>
    <ng-container *ngIf="icon !== undefined; else defaultButtonTemplate">
      <mat-icon>{{icon}}</mat-icon>
    </ng-container>
  </ng-template>
  <ng-template #defaultButtonTemplate>
    <mat-icon [svgIcon]="defaultSvgIcon"></mat-icon>
  </ng-template>
</button>
<mat-menu #filterMenu="matMenu" class="o-mat-menu">
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onFilterClicked()" *ngIf="showFilterOption">
    {{ 'FILTERBUILDERMENU.BUTTONS.FILTER' | oTranslate }}
  </button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onStoreFilterClicked()">
    {{ 'FILTERBUILDERMENU.BUTTONS.SAVE_FILTER' | oTranslate }}
  </button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onLoadFilterClicked()">
    {{ 'FILTERBUILDERMENU.BUTTONS.LOAD_FILTER' | oTranslate}}
  </button>
  <button type="button" mat-menu-item (click)="onClearFilterClicked()" *ngIf="showClearFilterOption">
    {{ 'FILTERBUILDERMENU.BUTTONS.CLEAR_FILTER' | oTranslate}}
  </button>
</mat-menu>
